name: Scenery Sandbox
description:
Scenery Sandbox is a mesh/world generation demo with a handful of cool features, such as:

  • A voxel engine built using Unity
  • Terrain generation
  • Cave generation
  • Cluster generation (the trees and flowers)
  • Micro voxel grids, built using the same engine, so you can place 3D items (such as the flowers)
  • Day/night cycles

Anyway, press SPACE to generate a new world, and TAB to toggle between real time and cinematic lighting. Enjoy!
